Summary: Star like brighter than Venus with no shimmer like a plane or a chopper.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Elk Grove
There were no other sightings in Elk Grove on or around January 20th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsflew over my appartment bright disk shape light like a spotlight but no sound and vibration of the light like a helecopter. Just one solid light moving faster than a plane or a jet. I counted it out to about 8 seconds I never left my eye's off it my daughter and my wife seen it with there own eye's. by the time I have counted up to 8 sec. it looked like a star and hovered I pulled out my daughters telescope it's a Meade High powered telescope I couldn't have a lock on the object it was moving to fast and it vanished.
